title: Is my father's uncle a mahram? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: second question is that the uncle of the father is he a muharram to a woman the answer is yes your father's paternal uncle or maternal uncle is your Muharram this is understood each Allah and the the brother of your grandfather who is the uncle of your father the same thing but your husband's uncle is not related to you and he's not a Muharram as so many Muslims think so this is a clearly Sharma
